intro: Sphaeranthus flexuosus, commonly known as the flexible globe flower, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features small, yellowish flowers arranged in dense, spherical clusters, giving it its common name. Its leaves are typically narrow and slightly curled, contributing to its distinctive appearance. Sphaeranthus flexuosus is often found in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils.
